Name: Initial Troubleshooting steps
Steps: Are you able to Make any calls?
If you are able to make calls try contacting us on 17070
Is your connection intermittent and preventing you from calling us?
Have you tried using the test socket?
Has the micro filter been changed?
Have you tried an alteranative handset?

Name: Damaged hardware steps
Steps: Are you able to both make or recieve calls?
Are you able to make outgoing calls?
Please, provide us with your phone number
Please, provide us with photos of the damage
